thoughts.text: I have written LISP code to a file with a .lisp extension. Now I can use the execute_shell command to run the LISP code and see if it passes the tests that I have written.
thoughts.reasoning: Now that I have written tests for LISP code that uses the key features of the LISP programming language, I need to apply these tests in practical ways. Running LISP code using the execute_shell command and checking if it passes the tests that I have written might be helpful in this regard.
